data.text: “But now men who are younger than I am make fun of me—
They were men who were old and ◄weak/worn out►;
They were very poor and hungry,
They pulled up plants in the desert and ate them
Everyone shouted at them as though they were thieves
They were forced to live in caves in the hills,
In the bushes they howled like animals because they were hungry,
They were people without good sense,
“And now their children sing songs to make fun of me.
They are disgusted with me, and they usually stay away from me,
Because it is as though [MET] God has cut my bowstring, he has caused me to be unable to defend myself, and he has humbled me,
◄Gangs/Groups of violent youths► attack me and force me to run away;
They prevent me from escaping,
It is as though I am a city wall and [SIM] they have broken through the wall,
I am very terrified;
“And now I [SYN] am about to die [IDM];
My bones ache during the night,
It is as though God seizes my clothes
He has thrown me into the mud;
“I cry out to God, but he does not answer/help me;
He acts very cruelly toward me;
He allows the wind to lift me up and blow me away,
I know that he will cause me to die,
“When people experience disasters,
That is what I did previously. I wept for people who were experiencing troubles,
But when I expected good things to happen to me, evil things happened;
I am very distressed [IDM], all the time;
I go about very discouraged;
My wailing sounds as sad as [MET] the cries of jackals/foxes and ostriches.
My skin has become dark/black and is peeling off,
Previously, I played joyful music on my harp and with my flute,
